paragraph.paragraph: Other Project Items is designed to hold all related, not project-specific project items. Typically the items will be located outside of a project's root location (where the EiffelEnvision project file (*.eifp) is found.)

Unlike the rest of EiffelEnvision's project item related nodes, Other Project Items uses virtual "links" to files, just as Visual C++ does with it's project files. This means a hierarchy of virutal_folders.xmlVirtual Folders can be created without a representation on disk, and files items placed in arbitrary folders not corresponding to any folder location on disk. For more information on "links" to files, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconFolder-BasedReference-BasedProjects.htmItem Management in Projects.
Existing items and new folder can also be added through the Other Project Items or any sub-folder context_menu.xmlcontext menu.
